differences.summary: Undefined variable in ReMDM equivalence claim
differences.why_impacts_score: Undermines theoretical rigor and notation clarity

evidence.baseline_quote: Asserts equivalence “σt = 1 − αs” without a formal derivation or theorem.
evidence.final_quote: Equivalence “σt = 1 − αs”, but s is undefined and no formal derivation.

differences.summary: Ambiguity on whether x̂0 is soft vs one-hot in Claim 1
differences.why_impacts_score: Adds ambiguity to core derivation and training objective

evidence.baseline_quote: Simplifies KL to −αt−1 log pθ(x0|xt) but does not discuss edge cases.
evidence.final_quote: Does not discuss edge cases or clarify whether x̂0 is soft vs one-hot consistently.

differences.summary: Non-monotonic PPL for Star+t_on=0.2 across step budgets
differences.why_impacts_score: Raises doubts about reliability of reported results

evidence.baseline_quote: Unusually low PPL 11.7 at 128 steps for “Star+t_on=0.2” merits clarification.
evidence.final_quote: Unusually low and non-monotonic PPL for “Star+t_on=0.2” (11.7, 24.5, 14.7).

differences.summary: Figure/text misreferences and t_on mapping contradictions
differences.why_impacts_score: Increases confusion and reduces clarity of empirical narrative

evidence.baseline_quote: Protocols not fully cross-referenced; mapping between regimes may confuse readers.
evidence.final_quote: Maps “pure Star” to t_on=1.0, mislabels Figure 3 panels; risks reader confusion.

differences.summary: Algorithms omit explicit time conditioning (fθ(xt) vs fθ(xt, t))
differences.why_impacts_score: Creates ambiguity about training/sampling, weakening reproducibility

evidence.baseline_quote: Algorithm 2 parameters lack defaults and OWT ablations; OWT unaddressed.
evidence.final_quote: Algorithms use fθ(xt) rather than fθ(xt, t); time dependence is ambiguous.

differences.summary: Clarity score rationale cites contradictions and duplications
differences.why_impacts_score: Explicitly lowers perceived readability and coherence

evidence.baseline_quote: Clarity (10): 8 — well-written, though some protocol/result consistency issues remain.
evidence.final_quote: Clarity (10): 7 — contradictions/misreferences and table duplications affect readability.
